name: Hogger
description:
Team: Karlet

Game Name: Hogger

Description:

In this game you help a little alien recover much needed space on his bed in order to sleep.

Development:

This game was developed Solo by Karlet

All content, except the sounds from boom_game_pack-epic_megajam (which were remixed to create the spaceship ambient) was created during the Megajam week.
